text:
Hey everyone, Merry Christmas!
Can someone recommend good book for Marketing? I've read Seth Godin's book and few others, but know I would love dive more to a theory stuff. Like:
Thanks in advance! :))

Consumer behaviour:

Perception
•sensory marketing
•perception (3stage process)

Consumer & Learning
•behevioural/cognitive learning theories
•types of memory (sensory, short-term, long-term)
•process of memory (encoding, storage, retrieval stage)

Motivation
•Motivation based on needs & wants & goals
•drive theory
•Maslow‘s hierarchy
•individual needs impact CBl

Consumer & brand personality

•trait theory
•personality traits
•brand personality

Affect
•basic wheel of emotions
•measuring affect
•affect & CB
•What influences affect?
•emotional selling
